meanings.definition: Using or containing an excessive amount of words.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's wordiest explanation confused the students.
meanings.sent2: Her wordiest essay was twice as long as anyone else's.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa's wordiest stories always put us to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The wordiest book on the shelf seemed to never end.
meanings.sent5: The wordiest speech at the conference was also the most boring.

meanings.sent1: The wordiest politician never seemed to get to the point.
meanings.sent2: His wordiest emails always took forever to read.
meanings.sent3: The wordiest cat in the neighborhood meowed endlessly.
meanings.sent4: The wordiest movie of the year felt like it would never finish.
meanings.sent5: The wordiest customer at the store always held up the line.
